text: Ross Shor Lynch (born on December 29, 1995) is an actor, singer, instrumentalist and dancer U.S. of Littleton, Colorado. He is most recognised for playing Austin Moon in the musical comedy of Disney Channel, Austin & Ally. He is a the key vocalist in his family band, R5 , which includes his two older brothers Rocky, Riker and only sister Rydel. His brother, Riker Lynch, has a minor recurring character in the hit series Glee. == Personal life == Ross Lynch was born and raised in Littleton, Colorado and is the fourth son of Mark and Stormie Lynch. He, with his brothers and sister, are members of the hit band R5. He was educated at home from the fourth grade and only attended a music/singing class in which they found their fifth and final member of the band, Ellington Ratliff. After his oldest brother had taken a liking to the bass guitar, He decided to also practice and thus the band had formed. He grew up imitating the songs of the movie Grease and former band 'N Sync with his brothers. The Teen heart-throb is one of five children, with three brothers and a sister (Riker, Ryland, Rocky, Rydel). In 2007, he moved with his family to California to pursue his career, which is where he gained his Disney career and later met his girlfriend, Courtney Eaton, an Australian model and actress. == Career == Ross Lynch has appeared in over 20 national commercials and several national campaigns and print advertising. R5 has also been featured in a series of music videos such as Hannah Montana on Disney Channel ,Kidz Bop and Kung Fu Panda. Ross can play piano, drums, guitar and the violin. In his Disney days he danced for The Rage Boyz Crew , a group founded by a dance company in the Southern California. He has appeared in So You Think You Can Dance and has had guest appearances on the series Moises Rules!, And can even be see in the movie Grapple! Anton Troy. Ross Lynch starred in the Disney Channel Original Series, Austin & Ally,Disney Channel sets sights on next-gen stars variety.com (27 January 2011). Retrieved 13 November 2011. in which he played a confident and charismatic singer Austin Moon, half of a musical duo that became a teen sensation (and heart-throb) on the Internet. Ross plays rhythm guitar in his family band R5 and has written Many original songs with his brothers, sister and family friend.Ross Lynch biografía r5rocks.com. 13 November 2011.Ross Lynch fotos r5rocks.com.
